line.originaltext: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded")

line.originaltext: 1 onion, chopped
2 tablespoons minced garlic
2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes
1 tablespoon dried basil
1 cube vegetable bouillon
black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped
line.annotation: create_ing(ing7, "1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped")

line.originaltext: 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray.
Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray.
Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet.
Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t1, ing10, "baked squash", "bake 35 minutes or until a knife can be easily inserted")

line.originaltext: Remove from oven, and cool.
Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray.
Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray.
Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown.
Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown.
Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t2, ing12, "sauteed onion and garlic", "medium heat until golden brown")

line.originaltext: Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6}, ing13, "sauce", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper.
Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t2, ing15, "sauce", "15 minutes or until you have a medium thick sauce")

line.originaltext: Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells.
Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells.
Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing16, ing17, ing7, ing8}, ing18, "shells", "layer ingredients in each half of shell")

line.originaltext: Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used.
line.annotation: do(ing18,"repeat previous step until all ingredients are used")

line.originaltext: Top with Parmesan cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing9}, ing19, "shells with cheese", "top shells with cheese")

line.originaltext: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "baked spaghetti squash", "bake 20 minutes or until cheese melts")
